scripts.start:demo: lerna exec --scope n2o-demo-client npm run start
scripts.start:simple: lerna exec --scope n2o-simple-project npm run start
scripts.start:notify: lerna exec --scope n2o-notifications npm run start
scripts.build:demo: lerna exec --scope n2o-demo-client npm run build
scripts.build:simple: lerna exec --scope n2o-simple-project npm run build
scripts.build:n2o: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run build
scripts.build:libs: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework --scope n2o-auth --scope n2o-notifications --parallel npm run build
scripts.compile:watch: concurrently --kill-others "npm run compile:es:watch" "npm run compile:lib:watch" "npm run compile:dist:watch"
scripts.compile:es:watch: lerna exec --parallel --stream --scope n2o-framework npm run compile:es:watch
scripts.compile:lib:watch: lerna exec --parallel --stream --scope n2o-framework npm run compile:lib:watch
scripts.compile:dist:watch: lerna exec --parallel --stream --scope n2o-framework npm run compile:dist:watch
scripts.dev: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run storybook
scripts.dev:docs: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run test:generate-output && lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run esdoc && lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run build-storybook
scripts.dev:precompile: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run test:generate-output
scripts.dev:esdoc: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run esdoc
scripts.dev:test: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run test
scripts.dev:test:hook: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run test:hook
scripts.dev:test:generate-output: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run test:generate-output
scripts.dev:storybook: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run build-storybook
scripts.dev:storybook:run: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run storybook
scripts.dev:lint: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run eslint
scripts.dev:lint:generate: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run eslint:generate
scripts.dev:prettier: lerna exec --scope n2o-framework npm run prettier
scripts.releaseScript: npm run releaseVersion && npm run startPublish
